'''Microsoft Corporation''' is an American multinational corporation and technology conglomerate headquartered in Redmond, Washington. They have owned the first-party game developer [[Mojang Studios]] since 2014, through [[Microsoft Gaming]]'s [[Xbox Game Studios]] division.
